title: Coming Full Circle at Da Poetry Lounge
description:
Jasmine Williams was 14 when she took a drama class that ignited her passion for poetry and changed her life. Now, she’s sharing that passion with people all over the world — and soon, with all of us at The Daily Smile.

Follow Jasmine on Instagram and online

Follow Da Poetry Lounge on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and online

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!
